summary: This document is an email from Amanda Kirby, an associate at Deutsche Bank Trust Company Americas, inquiring about the status of a list of items, specifically asking if she can remove JPM from her watch list. The email also includes a personal note to a colleague named Harry.

persons.name: Amanda Kirby
persons.context: Amanda Kirby is reaching out to colleagues regarding a list of items and specifically inquiring about JPM.

persons.name: Harry
persons.context: Harry is mentioned as someone who was very attentive to the matter at hand, and Amanda expresses that she misses him.

locations: 345 Park Avenue, New York, NY, USA
keyFacts: Amanda Kirby is an associate at Deutsche Bank Trust Company Americas.
The email discusses the status of JPM and whether it can be removed from a watch list.
Amanda expresses a personal sentiment towards her colleague Harry.
